product_name: Honey Stinger Kids' Organic Chews - Package of 5
long_description: The Honey Stinger Kids' Organic Chews are formulated specifically for health-conscious parents and kids seeking a great tasting snack. Chews include vitamin C, potassium, naturally occurring fiber and protein derived from 100% organic tapioca syrup and honey. Smaller in size than the original Chews, Honey Stinger Organic Kids' Chews taste amazing and don't stick to teeth, making them the perfect snack.
short_description: The Honey Stinger Kids' Organic Chews are formulated specifically for health-conscious parents and kids seeking a great tasting snack.
